full_summary:
# Task Based Professional Services (TSPS) Solicitation
## Solicitation Reference Number and Status
*Solicitation Reference Number:* E60ZT-18TSPS/D
*Solicitation Status:* **Open**
## Tender Details
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** July 4, 2028, 2:00 PM EST
* **Publication Date:** August 25, 2023
## Background
This solicitation is a request for supply arrangements (RFSAs) for Task-Based Professional Services (TSPS) to meet the Government of Canada's requirement for non-IT related task-based professional services equal to or above the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) threshold to locations throughout Canada.
## Scope of Work
The TSPS solicitation covers task-based requirements for the provision of professional services to locations throughout Canada. Suppliers will provide professional services in accordance with the requirements outlined in the solicitation documents.
## Solicitation Schedule
The solicitation schedule is as follows:
	+ Quarterly solicitations will be issued in alignment with the Government of Canada's fiscal years quarters: April to June, July to September, October to December, and January to March.
## Requirements for Suppliers
1. Suppliers must be pre-qualified for the TSPS Task-based Supply Arrangement (SA) through the Centralized Professional Services System (CPSS) e-Portal.
2. Suppliers must submit their bids through the CPSS e-Portal by the closing date and time of the solicitation.
3. Suppliers must submit any supporting documentation via email upon request by Canada.
## Contact Information
* **Contact Name:** Julie C. Morin
* **Contact Email:** TPSGC.spts-tsps.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone:** (343) 576-8807

You should not include any unnecessary information. Only provide what is relevant to the tender announcement. Ensure proper grammar and spelling throughout the rewritten text. 

Please note the multiple files are accessible at the following link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_verification/8499/e60zt-18tsps-d-amd-002_-2021-08-26.zip, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_verification/8499/e60zt-18tsps-d--2020-12-01.zip, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites
